column2: You gain a medium animal companion who can fight in combat and will listen to and carry out instructions you give it should you pass a Charisma check with DC determined by your GM.  Ordering the animal in combat costs an action.
column3: Your animal companions always follow your instructions.
column4: You gain a large animal companion who can fight in combat and will listen to and carry out instructions you give it.  Ordering the animal in combat costs an action.
